response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $15,000 to me. However, considering its immense potential benefits for you, I am willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your response soon.", "product_price": 14000}
